# Moshzion Pizza

## Summary
Moshzion Pizza is an online pizza ordering and delivery website with public pages for menu, business information, and FAQs.

## Canonical
- https://moshzion.vercel.app/

## Public Pages
- https://moshzion.vercel.app/
- https://moshzion.vercel.app/store
- https://moshzion.vercel.app/about
- https://moshzion.vercel.app/contacts
- https://moshzion.vercel.app/faqs
- https://moshzion.vercel.app/credits

## Public Assets
- https://moshzion.vercel.app/sitemap.xml
- https://moshzion.vercel.app/robots.txt

## Notes For Agents
- Prefer public landing and menu pages for general business information.
- Do not treat account, checkout, cart, or order pages as public reference content.
